lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.text: Now out from Darrington Press, Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a tactical board game, dealing with a semi-cooperative card play between factions of sailors that are vying to be the last claimed by the raging sea leviathan, Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For more details on Uk'otoa and other Darrington Press projects, visit darringtonpress.com.
